title: Samsung is rolling out another minor Wear OS update to the Galaxy Watch 4
content:
The Galaxy Watch 4 is the current king of the hill for Android smartwatches, and it just got a major update earlier this month with a bunch of new features. Now, Samsung is rolling out yet another update for the Galaxy Watch 4, though a very minor one.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung is rolling out another minor Wear OS update to the Galaxy Watch 4 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new update is rolling out to the Galaxy Watch 4 and Galaxy Watch 4 Classic, presumably to fix issues from the previous update.
